C

capacity - Variable in class carpooling_package.Car
is the number of passengers that the car can carry.
Car - Class in carpooling_package
This class contains everything related to the Car Class
car_code - Variable in class carpooling_package.Car
is the code for each car.
car_code - Variable in class carpooling_package.Ticket
is the code for the specified Car that related to the reserved ticket
It has a private access modifier.
car_obj - Static variable in class carpooling_package.Process
is an object from Car class to access this class.
car_pooling_obj - Static variable in class carpooling_package.Process
is an object from CarPooling class to access this class.
CarPooling - Class in carpooling_package
Car Pooling
CarPooling() - Constructor for class carpooling_package.CarPooling
 
carpooling_package - package carpooling_package
 
cars_array - Variable in class carpooling_package.Car
To make it easy, when I want to access the arrayList of cars.
cars_array - Static variable in class carpooling_package.RootClass
is an array to store all the cars.
check_discount(int) - Method in class carpooling_package.Ticket
This method to check discount because if the user is a subscriber there will a discount by 50%
Then decrease the number of trips for him by one
If the user is a non-subscriber, there'll not be a discount.
check_valid_car(int, int) - Method in class carpooling_package.Ticket
This method to check if the chosen car is valid which means there is a capacity in it.
checkAge() - Method in class carpooling_package.Subsciber
 
choice - Variable in class carpooling_package.Process
to read the input from the user.
choice_endOfStep - Static variable in class carpooling_package.RootClass
is the variable that I use in reading data from the user in the last step after opening each method which cintains 2 options (Return to Menu or Exit the program).
choice_menu - Static variable in class carpooling_package.RootClass
is the variable that I use in reading data from the user in menu page.
choose_Route(int) - Method in class carpooling_package.Car
is a method to make the user choose the route that he wants
And After checking it and making sure that it's a valid route, then the user can reserve a ticket.
chooseFromHomePage() - Static method in class carpooling_package.RootClass
is a method to take the input from the user which is the option that he chose to be executed
It's a "static method"
1 : Add New User
2 : Subscribe
3 : UnSubscribe
4 : Search for Route and Reserve a Ticket and after both the user can write a review if he wants.
chosen_route - Variable in class carpooling_package.Passenger
